title: All Change
description: Saffron knows when a curse is really a blessing. Having been thrown into the world of werewolves Saffron learns to adapt, but in the process falls in love with a dangerous young vampire. Arthur is dark, moody and gorgeous, not to mention a vampire, but he is equally poisonous. Their world is thrown upside down when the poison threatens to kill the young couple and the couple embark on a dangerous journey as the Council hunt them down. A group of teenage fight for their lives in an action packed journey.
author: India Taylor
